resources.string: You may choose no more than 9 apps at once!
The Xposed module will not take effect until you enable it in XposedInstaller\'s module setting.
VirtualXposed is an app that provides the ability to use the Xposed module without needing root access, unlocking the bootloader, or modifying the system image.
QQ Group (Click to copy group number)
Group number has been copied to clipboard!

In Meizu OS phones, you can only add an app to VirtualXposed by cloning an existing app that\'s already installed (you cannot install an app in VirtualXposed via sideloading an apk). You must also install XposedInstaller manually, as, unlike installations on other Android phones, it isn\'t built in to VirtualXposed when installing on Meizu OS. Please install XposedInstaller first.
Don\'t donate to me if you aren\'t rich :)
Installation may take a while, please be patient… :)
If you do not like my new icon, you are always welcome to design a new icon for VirtualXposed ;)

Thanks Cheney for providing the awesome icon, and thank you Pei, Peggy, and too many others to list, for your hard work. Thanks for the ideas and suggestions you all provided, and special thanks to YingLin for taking the time to help me achieve my design :)
Please allow VirtualXposed to run in the background, otherwise you may not receive notifications from some virtual apps.
Do you want to clear data of %1$s ?
Do you want to force stop %1$s ? This may cause unexpected app behaviours.
This will kill all apps currently running in VirtualXposed. Reboot anyway?
You have chosen an existing app. Do you want to install it as a separate app, or just update the existing one? \n(Installed version %1$s, Selected version: %2$s)
Sorry, repair failed; please re-install this app.
Repair success; please force-stop VirtualXposed for it to take effect.
The wallpaper choosen is too large and may increase the startup time, please choose a proper one.

Storage Redirection redirects an application\'s access from the real SD card to a virtual SD card, which will prevent certain apps from creating directories in your real SD card; however, after the storage redirection is enabled, the application can no longer access the real SD card. Please select it when prompted.
You have chosen an existing app, \n(Installed version %1$s, selected version: %2$s). Install it?
Please add both the app and the Xposed module to VirtualXposed first, otherwise the Xposed module won\'t take effect.
If you can enter settings by the menu key on main activity, you can hide this; you may not be able to enter settings otherwise! \n(Restart VirtualXposed to take effect.)
Do not show VirtualXposed\'s installer when you choose apk file in system
Go back to the system launcher instead of the virtual launcher when in a virtual app.\n(Restart VirtualXposed to take effect.)

Please specify your phone model, Android version, Xposed plugin, and version of the corresponding app, and then describe (in as much detail as possible) the problem you are experiencing, otherwise it is considered invalid feedback (because we can\'t effectively troubleshoot and fix said problem with only \"this app crashes\" ;) )
Disable the persistent notification of VirtualXposed. (When disabled, VirtualXposed may be killed by the system frequently. Use with caution!)
Enable/Disable Xposed module (You must enable it manually for it to take effect)
Xposed Installer not found, please add it to VirtualXposed first!
When enabled, you can install apk which has no signatures(Usually applies to cracked/modded apps, please be careful )
Allow to install apk without signatures.
%1$s doesn\'t support runtime permission, you must give permissions it needs in advance, please allow all the permission it will request in next step, otherwise it may not work properly.
App: %1$s doesn\'t grant necessary permission, if it doesn\'t work properly, please go to your device\'s permission management and give it permissions.
If you want to install apk from external storage, please give VirtualXposed the permission.
The Google Service is supported by microG, VirtualXposed is about to download some file(2M), and it may consume more battery, would you like to install it?
Install Google Service automatically failed, you can also install it manually.
Would you like to uninstall Google Service? you can reinstall it later.
The Google Service has been installed.
Google Service has been installed successfully!!
Google Service has been uninstalled successfully!!
My bitconins address has been copied to clipboard:)
When disabled, all Xposed module won\'t take effect.
File Manager is supported by Amaze File Manager, download(about 3M) and install it now?
Permission Manager is implemented by XPrivacyLua, download(about 1.7M) and install it now?

A long time ago, I revealed the information about EXposed. After a period of feedback and adjustment, EXposed has reached a milestone. Many users may don't know it, let me introduce you today. 


Like the VirtualXposed I created earlier, EXposed is also an app that makes you use Xposed module without root, unlock the bootloader. they both have their own advantages, and EXposed will be much better in terms of performance and stability due to running directly in the native system; while VirtualXposed is based on VitualApp, which is like Parallel Space. EXposed was born a month, and its stability has surpassed VirtualXposed which has been developed for nearly a year. 


Currently, EXposed has been put on the app store and renamed to Tai Chi. You can try it out :)
When enabled, You can set VirtualXposed be the Launcher of system
An easy way to use Xposed
You can use Xposed modules through TaiChi except VirtualXposed. VirtualXposed supports Virtual-App，while TaiChi is much more stable.
The version of TaiChi installed is too old, Please install the latest Taichi!
